Business news

Construction
The Turkish construction contractor Ronesans announced leaving Russia. He built "Lachta Center."
Turkey ' s building blocking Ronesans Holding sold business in Russia and invested in other countries.
20:51, 03 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Tourism
Seven factors were identified in Smoln as attracting business tourists in Petersburg
The analysts of St. Petersburg ' s Turbarometer identified seven major factors that attract business tourists to the North Capital.
13:17, 03 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Cases
"At first, of course, shock." Hendirector Wildberries told me how he found out about the fire at the warehouse in Shushharah.
The Director-General and founder of the Wildberries Marketpleys Tatiana Bakalchuk told journalists how he had learned about the fire at the company ' s warehouse in Peterburg Shusharah and clarified that several versions were considered as possible causes of the fire.
12:00, 03 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Transaction
The RAO Inter purchased a former Sile Machinery and Toshiba in Petersburg.
The Russian Energy Company PAO Inter RAO acquired in Petersburg the former joint venture (JS) of the end of Sil Cars and the Japanese Toshiba Corporation.
09:59, 03 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Quinoa
The sanctions and withdrawal of Western strings have unleashed the Russian film and television industry.
As a result of 2023, the share of Russian films in the total rental fee was 72 per cent, from the Film Fund. Last year ' s annual market for films corresponds to the level of fees of 2021 - 40.7 billion roubles. However, revenues from the rental of domestic films increased 2.7 times from 10.4 billion to 28 billion roubles over 2021.
07:14, 03 February 2024♪
Alina Kisyakova
Banks
Financial Füger: Russian banks have learned to live under sanctions
The results of 2023 have not yet been reached, but the profits of the banking sector by December exceeded 3.2 trillion roubles, an absolute historical record. The previous (2021 results in 2.4 trillion) was hit by 1 September. Since then, credit rates have risen and commission revenues have increased. Regulator, really, in January, assumed that, in 2024, appetites of bankers would be down to a "more than 2 trillion roubles." At the beginning of December, the 2022 was a total of 2.1 to 2.6 trillion.
07:13, 03 February 2024♪
Eugenia Petrov
Tourism
The growth of the turpot in Petersburg will make the local kitchen a popular cafe.
According to the Tourism Development Committee, Petersburg visited 9.4 million guests (+16 per cent of the 2022nd level). There are visible trends in the growth of hotel markets, owners recorded high rates, and even the autumn, which is traditionally considered to be a period of average loading, has shown good results in the past year. According to the Hotel Advisors, the loading of Petersburg hotels as a whole was 63.9 per cent in 2023. Comparison: 2022 - 56.3 per cent.
07:12, 03 February 2024♪
Darya Dimitrieva
Economy
Petersburg made a breakthrough in industry, transport and trade.
The Northern Capital is now one of the leading regions in the country in the field of industry, as well as in some ways the model for transport reform. "We are proud of the successes in industry, transport and trade," said on 31 January by the Vice-Governor of St. Petersburg Kirill Polakov at a press conference at the TAS.
07:10, 03 February 2024♪
Svetlan Afonina
Entertainment
Prices of base horses in Petersburg reached 4-7 thousand roubles
Over the past 20 years, skating has again become a mass and leisure time: for children and adults. The question naturally gives rise to a proposal. The current season in Petersburg has about 230 boats, with 164 open-access sites.
07:07, 03 February 2024♪
Igor Gurfinkel
Main day
Removal of retirees, Metrostroya Court, KAD-2 and SMDD: Petersburg 2 February
More than 200 MVD retirees and their families may choose the apartments they received during their service. 60 people have no other housing.
23:03, 02 February 2024♪
Anastasia Kotelnikova
Telecom and IT
The Yandex registered to the Kalininggrad SAR Management Fund
Company"Yandex."registered in the special administrative area (SAR) of Kaliningrad Management Fund.
15:50, 02 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Real property
Selling apartments in the new structures of Lez regions has been hit by a five-year record
In 2023, 244,000 apartments were purchased in the Leningrad region, 23 per cent more than 2022.
15:13, 02 February 2024♪
dp.ru
News
Pheterburg news story
Pheterburg news story
14:04, 02 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Business news
The Severstali shares responded to the announcement of the dividends above the forecast.
Following a decision of the Board of Directors of the Soverstal Mining Company to pay dividends exceeding market expectations, the company ' s shares showed an increase.
11:56, 02 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Construction
The contractor from Petersburg will build a polyclinic in Slavianca for 5.4 billion roubles
GKU ' s Capital and Reconstruction Foundation signed a contract for the design and construction of a polyclinics in Slavanka with the SS-17 on 5.4 billion roubles.
10:37, 02 February 2024♪
Alexander Lobanowski
Reteil
Zarina, Befree and Love Republic owner engaged in cosmetics
Petersburg CompanyMelon Fashion Group(MFG), which belongs to Befree, Zarina, Love Republic, Sela and Idol, initiated the production of cosmetics. The new bouti brand will supplement the line of the goods of the Love Republic.
10:18, 02 February 2024♪
dp.ru
Warehouse property
The deficiency of warehouses in Petersburg risks increasing rent rates even further
As a result of 2023, the total volume of purchased and leased warehouses throughout Russia was 6.1 million m2, calculated in IBC Real Estate. This is the highest in the history of the warehouse market and is 2.5 times higher than in 2022. Of the 6.1 million m2 per Moscow and Moscow region, 3.4 million m2, Petersburg is 1 million m2.
09:46, 02 February 2024♪
Evgeny Ivanov
Resignations and appointments
I left the chair: what was caused by the reinsertions in the Baltic Lizing Manual?
The Baltic Leasing GS decision was published on 29 January on the Information Disclosure server. Judging from the press interview with Korchagov on the Internet, published on 31 January, the decision to dismiss was suddenly taken. A few days earlier, Korchagov approved changes to the bond programme registered in 2016, increasing the debt ceiling from 100 billion to 150 billion roubles. Rusbonds estimates that, to date, the OO bond debt is 37.7 billion roubles.
09:26, 02 February 2024♪
Eugenia Petrov
Labour market
A total of 142 companies from Petersburg were listed as best employers.
ServiceHeadHuntersubmitted annual employers ' ratings. Of the 1,497 rating finalists, 142 peterburg companies were listed. Last year ' s list included 123 enterprises from Petersburg. The methodology is based on the results of a survey of prospectors, opinions of active staff and an expert assessment of the development of the HR Processes in the company.
09:18, 02 February 2024♪
Alina Kisyakova
Tourism
Moscow and Petersburg took most of the good tourists.
The tourist leaders of Petersburg and Moscow took stock in 2023 under the two-cities-million impressions programme. It was launched to combine the modern tourism potential of the two capitals. The traveller was supposed to be able to visit both towns in one trip.
09:13, 02 February 2024♪
Darya Dimitrieva
